title: PSA: Highly recommend not pre-selecting your preferred champ
body: People are starting to ban peoples preferred champ in a bid to try and take their lane. Sad I know, I've had it happen to me twice already in my provisionals

replies.body: just pick teemo? or urgot for pref? or nothing at all ?
I have not had this happen at all. Exactly the opposite. I've had people avoid banning it, first pick for me and trade if it's a contested pick. :/
I rarely pick my champion without any information about mine or the enemy team's comp anyway
